title: Installation issue: hdf5+fortran %oneapi
body:
Despite PR #22683, I still fail to compile HDF5+fortran with Intel OneAPI, either 2021.1.1 or 2021.2.0.
This is both on Ubuntu x86_64 18.04 and 20.04 
Basic error remains the same : there is a failing -loopopt=0 from configure.
$ spack install hdf5+fortran~mpi+shared %oneapiAT2021.2
==> Installing zlib-1.2.11-jesz5iyurv6flmlwyt3lolavgui6f6vn
==> No binary for zlib-1.2.11-jesz5iyurv6flmlwyt3lolavgui6f6vn found: installing from source
==> Fetching https://spack-llnl-mirror.s3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com/_source-cache/archive/c3/c3e5e9fdd5004dcb542feda5ee4f0ff0744628baf8ed2dd5d66f8ca1197cb1a1.tar.gz
################################################################################################################ 100.0%
==> No patches needed for zlib
==> zlib: Executing phase: 'install'
==> zlib: Successfully installed zlib-1.2.11-jesz5iyurv6flmlwyt3lolavgui6f6vn
  Fetch: 2.82s.  Build: 2.51s.  Total: 5.33s.
[+] /tmp/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu18.04-zen2/oneapi-2021.2/zlib-1.2.11-jesz5iyurv6flmlwyt3lolavgui6f6vn
==> Installing hdf5-1.10.7-rypct3qztneeyaxk3ihv2vf7ttxc5hty
==> No binary for hdf5-1.10.7-rypct3qztneeyaxk3ihv2vf7ttxc5hty found: installing from source
==> Fetching https://spack-llnl-mirror.s3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com/_source-cache/archive/7a/7a1a0a54371275ce2dfc5cd093775bb025c365846512961e7e5ceaecb437ef15.tar.gz
################################################################################################################ 100.0%
==> Ran patch() for hdf5
==> hdf5: Executing phase: 'autoreconf'
==> hdf5: Executing phase: 'configure'
==> Error: ProcessError: Command exited with status 1:
    '/tmp/cessenat/spack-stage/spack-stage-hdf5-1.10.7-rypct3qztneeyaxk3ihv2vf7ttxc5hty/spack-src/configure' '--prefix=/tmp/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu18.04-zen2/oneapi-2021.2/hdf5-1.10.7-rypct3qztneeyaxk3ihv2vf7ttxc5hty' '--enable-unsupported' '--enable-symbols=yes' '--with-zlib=/tmp/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu18.04-zen2/oneapi-2021.2/zlib-1.2.11-jesz5iyurv6flmlwyt3lolavgui6f6vn' '--disable-threadsafe' '--disable-cxx' '--disable-hl' '--enable-fortran' '--disable-java' '--without-szlib' '--enable-build-mode=production' '--enable-shared' 'CFLAGS=-fPIC' 'CXXFLAGS=-fPIC' 'FCFLAGS=-fPIC'

2 errors found in build log:
     86    checking what /tmp/spack/lib/spack/env/oneapi/ifx does with modules... module.mod
     87    checking how /tmp/spack/lib/spack/env/oneapi/ifx finds modules... -I
     88    checking if Fortran compiler version compatible with Fortran 2003 HDF... yes
     89    checking how to get verbose linking output from /tmp/spack/lib/spack/env/oneapi/ifx... -v
     90    checking for Fortran libraries of /tmp/spack/lib/spack/env/oneapi/ifx...  **-loopopt=0** -L/opt/intel/oneapi/co
           mpiler/2021.2.0/linux/compiler/lib/intel64_lin -L/opt/intel/oneapi/compiler/2021.2.0/linux/lib -L/usr/lib/g
           cc/x86_64-linux-gnu/7/ -L/usr/lib/gcc/x86_64-linux-gnu/7/../../../x86_64-linux-gnu/ -L/usr/lib/gcc/x86_64-l
           inux-gnu/7/../../../../lib/ -L/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/ -L/lib/../lib64 -L/lib/../lib/ -L/usr/lib/x86_64-linux
           -gnu/ -L/usr/lib/../lib/ -L/usr/lib/gcc/x86_64-linux-gnu/7/../../../ -L/lib64 -L/lib/ -L/usr/lib -L/usr/lib
           /i386-linux-gnu -lifport -lifcoremt -limf -lsvml -lm -lipgo -lirc -lpthread -lirc_s -ldl
     91    checking for dummy main to link with Fortran libraries... unknown
  >> 92    configure: error: in `/tmp/cessenat/spack-stage/spack-stage-hdf5-1.10.7-rypct3qztneeyaxk3ihv2vf7ttxc5hty/sp
           ack-src':
  >> 93    configure: error: linking to Fortran libraries from C fails
     94    See `config.log' for more details
     94    See `config.log' for more details

See build log for details:
  /tmp/cessenat/spack-stage/spack-stage-hdf5-1.10.7-rypct3qztneeyaxk3ihv2vf7ttxc5hty/spack-build-out.txt


Also, there are weird errors with
- OneAPI 2021.1.1:
$ spack install hdf5ATdevelop+fortran~mpi+shared %oneapiAT2021.1 ^autoconf@2.71
... bla bla bla ...
     9058    libtool: compile:  /home/cessenat/Softs/spack/lib/spack/env/oneapi/ifx -I. -
             I../../src -stand:f03 -free -warn:all -g -O3 -I../../src -I../../fortran/src
              -fPIC -c HDF5.F90 -o HDF5.o >/dev/null 2>&1
     9059      FCLD     libhdf5_fortran.la
     9060    ld: .libs/H5_ff.o: **relocation R_X86_64_PC32 against symbol `h5global_mp_pred
             ef_types_' can not be used when making a shared object; recompile with -fPIC**
  >> 9061    ld: final link failed: bad value
     9062    make[3]: *** [Makefile:987: libhdf5_fortran.la] Error 1
     9063    make[3]: Leaving directory '/tmp/cessenat/spack-stage/spack-stage-hdf5-devel
             op-yxj7hfd2ulqg2sdkboqozeufaaullqfp/spack-src/fortran/src'

- OneAPI 2021.2.0:
$ spack install hdf5ATdevelop+fortran~mpi+shared %oneapiAT2021.2 ^autoconf@2.71
... bla bla bla ...
  >> 9286    tf.F90(150): error #5528: The REFERENCE attribute cannot be used with a pass
             ed length CHARACTER variable on this platform
     9287           INTEGER FUNCTION h5_fixname_c(base_name, base_namelen, fapl, &
     9288    -------------------------------------^
  >> 9289    tf.F90(151): error #5528: The REFERENCE attribute cannot be used with a pass
             ed length CHARACTER variable on this platform
     9290                full_name, full_namelen)
     9291    ------------^
  >> 9292    tf.F90(207): error #5528: The REFERENCE attribute cannot be used with a pass
             ed length CHARACTER variable on this platform
     9293           INTEGER FUNCTION h5_cleanup_c(base_name, base_namelen, fapl)
     9294    -------------------------------------^
     9295    compilation aborted for tf.F90 (code 1)

<!-- Please include the output of `spack debug report` -->
* **Spack:** 0.16.1-2002-09dcb16a70
* **Python:** 3.6.9
* **Platform:** linux-ubuntu18.04-zen2
* **Concretizer:** original

<!-- If you have any relevant configuration detail (custom `packages.yaml` or `modules.yaml`, etc.) you can add that here as well. -->
~/.spack/linux/compilers.yaml
- compiler:
    spec: oneapi@2021.2
    paths:
      cc: /opt/intel/oneapi/compiler/2021.2.0/linux/bin/icx
      cxx: /opt/intel/oneapi/compiler/2021.2.0/linux/bin/icpx
      f77: /opt/intel/oneapi/compiler/2021.2.0/linux/bin/ifx
      fc: /opt/intel/oneapi/compiler/2021.2.0/linux/bin/ifx
    flags: {}
    operating_system: ubuntu18.04
    target: x86_64
    modules: [compiler/2021.2.0]
    environment:
      append_path:
        LD_LIBRARY_PATH: ${LD_LIBRARY_PATH}:/opt/intel/oneapi/compiler/2021.2.0/linux/compiler/lib/intel64_lin
      set:
        MODULEPATH: ${MODULEPATH}:/opt/intel/oneapi/modulefiles
    extra_rpaths:
    - /opt/intel/oneapi/compiler/2021.2.0/linux/compiler/lib/intel64_lin


### Additional information

<!-- Please upload the following files. They should be present in the stage directory of the failing build. Also upload any config.log or similar file if one exists. -->
* [spack-build-out.txt](
[spack-build-out.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/6243465/spack-build-out.txt)
) 
[spack-build-out.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/6243589/spack-build-out.txt)

* [spack-build-env.txt](
[spack-build-env.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/6243466/spack-build-env.txt)
)
[spack-build-env.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/6243591/spack-build-env.txt)

Addon:
 -error for "spack install hdf5ATdevelop+fortran~mpi+shared %oneapiAT2021.1 ^autoconf@2.71":
[hdf5_spack-build-out_oneapi2021-1.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/6243529/hdf5_spack-build-out_oneapi2021-1.txt)
[hdf5_spack-build-env_oneapi2021-1.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/6243544/hdf5_spack-build-env_oneapi2021-1.txt)

 -error for "spack install hdf5ATdevelop+fortran~mpi+shared %oneapiAT2021.2 ^autoconf@2.71":
[hdf5_spack-build-out_oneapi2021-2.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/6243531/hdf5_spack-build-out_oneapi2021-2.txt)
[hdf5_spack-build-env_oneapi2021-2.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/6243546/hdf5_spack-build-env_oneapi2021-2.txt)

<!-- Some packages have maintainers who have volunteered to debug build failures. Run `spack maintainers <name-of-the-package>` and @mention them here if they exist. -->
@lrknox @tgamblin @frankwillmore

### General information

<!-- These boxes can be checked by replacing [ ] with [x] or by clicking them after submitting the issue. -->
- [x] I have run `spack debug report` and reported the version of Spack/Python/Platform
- [x] I have run `spack maintainers <name-of-the-package>` and @mentioned any maintainers
- [x] I have uploaded the build log and environment files
- [x] I have searched the issues of this repo and believe this is not a duplicate
